00083 enum L4_vcon_write_consts
00084 {
00086   L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE = (L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE - 2) * sizeof(l4_umword_t),
00087 };

00115 typedef struct l4_vcon_attr_t
00116 {
00117   l4_umword_t i_flags; 
00118   l4_umword_t o_flags; 
00119   l4_umword_t l_flags; 
00120 } l4_vcon_attr_t;

00127 {

00129   L4_VCON_IGNCR  = 000200, 
00130   L4_VCON_ICRNL  = 000400, 
00131 };

00191 
00198 enum L4_vcon_ops
00199 {
00200   L4_VCON_WRITE_OP       = 0UL,    
00201   L4_VCON_SET_ATTR_OP    = 2UL,    
00202   L4_VCON_GET_ATTR_OP    = 3UL,    
00203 };
00204 
00205 /******* Implementations ********************/
00206 
00207 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00208 l4_vcon_send_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char const *buf, int size, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00209 {
00210   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00211   mr->mr[0] = L4_VCON_WRITE_OP;
00212   mr->mr[1] = size;
00213   __builtin_memcpy(&mr->mr[2], buf, size);
00214   return l4_ipc_send(vcon, utcb,
00215                      l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_LOG,
00216                                2 + (size + sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t),
00217                                0, L4_MSGTAG_SCHEDULE),
00218                                L4_IPC_NEVER);
00219 }
00220 
00221 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00222 l4_vcon_send(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char const *buf, int size) L4_NOTHROW
00223 {
00224   return l4_vcon_send_u(vcon, buf, size, l4_utcb());
00225 }
00226 
00227 L4_INLINE long
00228 l4_vcon_write_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char const *buf, int size, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00229 {
00230   l4_msgtag_t t;
00231 
00232   if (size > L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE)
00233     size = L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE;
00234 
00235   t = l4_vcon_send_u(vcon, buf, size, utcb);
00236   if (l4_msgtag_has_error(t))
00237     return l4_error(t);
00238 
00239   return size;
00240 }
00241 
00242 L4_INLINE long
00243 l4_vcon_write(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char const *buf, int size) L4_NOTHROW
00244 {
00245   return l4_vcon_write_u(vcon, buf, size, l4_utcb());
00246 }
00247 
00248 L4_INLINE int
00249 l4_vcon_read_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char *buf, int size, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00250 {
00251   int ret, r;
00252   l4_msg_regs_t *mr;
00253 
00254   if (size <= 0)
00255     return -L4_EINVAL;
00256 
00257   mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00258   mr->mr[0] = size << 16;
00259 
00260   ret = l4_error_u(l4_ipc_call(vcon, utcb,
00261                                l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_LOG, 1, 0, 0),
00262                                L4_IPC_NEVER), utcb);
00263   if (ret < 0)
00264     return ret;
00265 
00266   r = mr->mr[0] & ~(1U << 31);
00267 
00268   if (!(mr->mr[0] & (1UL << 31))) // !eof
00269     ret = size + 1;
00270   else if (r < size)
00271     ret = r;
00272   else
00273     ret = size;
00274 
00275   __builtin_memcpy(buf, &mr->mr[1], r < size ? r : size);
00276   return ret;
00277 }
00278 
00279 L4_INLINE int
00280 l4_vcon_read(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char *buf, int size) L4_NOTHROW
00281 {
00282   return l4_vcon_read_u(vcon, buf, size, l4_utcb());
00283 }
00284 
00285 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00286 l4_vcon_set_attr_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, l4_vcon_attr_t const *attr,
00287                    l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00288 {
00289   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00290 
00291   mr->mr[0] = L4_VCON_SET_ATTR_OP;
00292   __builtin_memcpy(&mr->mr[1], attr, sizeof(*attr));
00293 
00294   return l4_ipc_call(vcon, utcb,
00295                      l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_LOG, 4, 0, 0),
00296                      L4_IPC_NEVER);
00297 }
00298 
00299 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00300 l4_vcon_set_attr(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, l4_vcon_attr_t const *attr) L4_NOTHROW
00301 {
00302   return l4_vcon_set_attr_u(vcon, attr, l4_utcb());
00303 }
00304 
00305 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00306 l4_vcon_get_attr_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, l4_vcon_attr_t *attr,
00307                    l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00308 {
00309   l4_msgtag_t res;
00310   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00311 
00312   mr->mr[0] = L4_VCON_GET_ATTR_OP;
00313 
00314   res = l4_ipc_call(vcon, utcb,
00315                     l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_LOG, 1, 0, 0),
00316                     L4_IPC_NEVER);
00317   if (l4_error_u(res, utcb) >= 0)
00318     __builtin_memcpy(attr, &mr->mr[1], sizeof(*attr));
00319 
00320   return res;
00321 }
00322 
00323 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00324 l4_vcon_get_attr(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, l4_vcon_attr_t *attr) L4_NOTHROW
00325 {
00326   return l4_vcon_get_attr_u(vcon, attr, l4_utcb());
00327 }
